Functions.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics6rando.name: random(from:to:)
Functions.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics6rando.abstract: Returns a random number in the given range, inclusive.

Functions.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics3map5v.name: map(value:fromLower:fromUpper:toLower:toUpper:)
Functions.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics3map5v.abstract: Re-maps a number from one range to another.

Enums.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics7QualityO.name: Quality
Enums.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics7QualityO.abstract: Set to High (2x) or Ultra (4x) when generating output for printing, otherwise use Standard.

Enums.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics14AnchorPo.name: AnchorPosition
Enums.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics14AnchorPo.abstract: Used to specify how rectangles should be anchored

Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.name: playgroundDescription
Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.abstract: Returns the bitmap image used for Xcode Playground quick looks; represents current state of the canvas at any given time.

Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.name: framesPerSecond
Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.abstract: Frame rate for animation on this canvas

Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.name: frameCount
Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.abstract: Keeps track of how many frames have been animated using this particular canvas

Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.name: defaultLineWidth
Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.abstract: Default line width for lines drawn using drawLine()

Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.name: lineColor
Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.abstract: Line color, default is black

Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.name: defaultBorderWidth
Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.abstract: Default border width for closed shapes

Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.name: borderColor
Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.abstract: Border color, default is black

Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.name: fillColor
Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.abstract: Fill color, default is black

Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.name: textColor
Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.abstract: Text color, default is black

Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.name: drawShapesWithBorders
Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.abstract: Whether to draw shapes with borders

Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.name: drawShapesWithFill
Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.abstract: Whether to draw shapes with fill

Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.name: highPerformance
Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.abstract: Draw in high performance mode. When true, canvas image does not get updated after every draw call. This should generally be kept at the default value of false.

Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.name: init(width:height:quality:)
Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.abstract: Creates a canvas object that can be drawn upon.

Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.name: drawText(message:at:size:kerning:)
Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.abstract: Draw text beginning at the point specified.

Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.name: drawLine(from:to:lineWidth:capStyle:)
Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.abstract: Draw a line segment between the provided points.

Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.name: drawEllipse(at:width:height:borderWidth:)
Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.abstract: Draw an ellipse centred at the point specified.

Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.name: drawRectangle(at:width:height:anchoredBy:borderWidth:)
Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.abstract: Draw a rectangle at the specified point and anchor position.

Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.name: drawRoundedRectangle(at:width:height:anchoredBy:borderWidth:xRadius:yRadius:)
Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.abstract: Draw a rounded rectangle at the specified point and anchor position.

Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.name: drawCustomShape(with:)
Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.abstract: Draws a closed polygon from the given vertices.

Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.name: rotate(by:)
Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.abstract: Rotate the canvas around the origin.

Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.name: translate(to:)
Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.abstract: Translate the origin of the canvas to a new location.

Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.name: saveState()
Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.abstract: Save the current state of the canvas (location of origin, rotation of canvas).

Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.name: restoreState()
Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.abstract: Restore a prior state of the canvas (location of origin, rotation of canvas).

Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.name: copyToClipboard()
Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.abstract: Copies the contents of the canvas to the clipboard.

Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.name: drawAxes()
Classes/Canvas.html#/s:14CanvasGraphics0.abstract: Draws horizontal and vertical axes based on the current location of the origin and rotation of the canvas.

Classes/Canvas.html.name: Canvas
Classes/Canvas.html.abstract: Carries out the heavy lifting to generate bitmap graphics

Classes/Color.html.name: Color
Classes/Color.html.abstract: Used to set colors of figures generated by CanvasGraphics framework
